website_summaries.verdict: Shark's most versatile rotator-powered model with 3-in-1 capabilities; an upright vacuum, brush roll pod, and canister all in one.
pros: Has everything you need in a vacuum, including washable HEPA filter, reliable attachments, and convenient Lift-Away technology
cons: It's heavy and expensive, but it offers Shark's most impressive capabilities

website_summaries.verdict: This vacuum is the perfect choice to help households with dogs and cats manage all the pet hair.
pros: Fast and easy conversion to a handheld vacuum for use on furniture
Swivel steering for reaching into tight areas
cons: It's on the heavier side and may be bulky to carry

website_summaries.verdict: With a remarkable amount of flexibility afforded by its well-implemented features, the Shark Rotator Powered Lift-Away is as easy to use as any full-size upright we've tested. To top it off, it cleans almost as well as vacuums that cost twice as much.
pros: The Shark Rotator Powered Lift-Away lets you switch among its many functions to clean every surface in a room without ever breaking stride or turning off the vacuum
Especially on carpets, it performs on par with high end uprights for a mid-range price
cons: It's not great at hardwood floors
Even the dedicated hard-floor genie couldn't help it grab large particles off of hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Roller brush stops working
customer_reviews.text: Roller brush stopped working. Shark customer service tells me to firmly replace the wand to make sure it’s engaged.Had to do this a million times and now it’s just not working at all. Bought in February 2017. Update...I contacted amazon and they had a new vacuum, two day shipping on its way in two hours. Sharks customer service asked me if it was on and plugged in. LOL Thanks amazon! You Rock!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this item I bought on aug 2 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this item I bought on aug 2 2017 has a five year manufactures warrannty also bought extended three year warranty advised beaterbar is not covered and will cost $119.00 to replace need whole bottom unit so what good is the warranty the bottom is the main workings of the unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor died almost immidently
customer_reviews.text: So SO disappointed with this vacuum, and the seller. I've been trying for over a YEAR to get in contact with shark, because not even a month after receiving this vacuum the motor started to die. I've emailed, mailed, and tweeted to them with no success. Now, not even a year later, my vacuum has completely stopped working. I am SO upset I spent almost 300 dollars on something to just have it sent to me broken, and then not even be able to get a replacement or repair. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Christineii

customer_reviews.title: Works well, difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum really sucks! As in it is very powerful and has great features. Comes with more attachments than I’ll ever use and the canister is huge and holds a LOT of dirt and pet hair! BUT, it’s unfortunately very heavy and awkward to manage when you remove the canister. The flexible hose is too short which makes using the handheld attachments irritating because the canister is always getting pulled over on its side. It’s hard to love it because it’s extremely cumbersome, but hard to hate it because it works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: We love this vacuum, however...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our first Shark Rotator TruePet Powered vacuum in December 2014. We are now bumping elbows with December 2017 and have replaced the motorized nozzle twice, due to an inferior, poor quality roller, rendering the vacuum unable to function. Cost? $151.50 each time. It's a DIY replacement. That's 3 nozzles over the course of 3 years. You can't replace just the roller ... you have to buy the entire motorized unit. At any rate... We did purchase a new Shark Rotator TruePet Powered Vacuum this week because we simply "love this vacuum." What more can I say other than perhaps Shark will see this post and make an effort to improve the roller.
customer_reviews.author: KiT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum less than two months ago and it has already broken. We use it maybe once or twice a week and a part of the roller has melted, right beside the belt. I am very disappointed in the quality of such an expensive and well known brand in Shark. Not a good choice for plush carpeting if the product is only going to be effective for a month or two. Hoping I can get a full refund for this product, despite it being past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine E James

customer_reviews.title: Love Shark just not this one.
customer_reviews.text: Dust cup hinges keep breaking! Didn't know they would send me one for free so I purchased one. It broke in same way with in a week. Sent me another one as my 1 free replacement(July 2017). It just broke again! They won't send a replacement with out paying ANOTHER $45.00. This is a regular issue with the hinges.........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll Never Buy a Different Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Woah. It's actually fun to vacuum with this. It works so well! The pet attachments for upholstery and carpet are no joke. They really do get anything clean. I have back problems but the detachable wand and handle make it super easy for even me to use! Great for stairs too. The filter is really easy to access and clean and the container empties really easily as well. I like that it separates the dirt from other little knicknacks you might accidentally vacuum up. That's probably my favorite feature, actually. I did a lot of research before buying this vacuum and I have to say, 10/10, if you have pets, get this vacuum. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Rattling and shaking after 5th use
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine even though I’m sure it’d be amazing if it were cordless. My problem is that after having it 2 months and using it 5 times!! It is now shaking a lot. I cleaned it and made sure nothing was stuck on the brush. Nothing works and I can’t return it. It’s past the return window. This is not cheap. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Worthless junk
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for wasting my time Amazon missing attachments the box was smashed when it arrived way too heavy model from two years ago was better and half the price what more can I say they spend all the money on advertisement and marketing when all they have to do is build a good machine to start with. This is very cheap quality low grade material It did seem to contain the air well though
customer_reviews.author: DUKE

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and they shed extraordinary amounts. I usually go through two vacuums a year. I bought this vacuum in December 16, 2018; it’s still works perfectly. It’s sucked dog toys right into the tank. As it’s gotten “older,” it has clogged with large wads of hair and a sock. I don’t really have stairs but it does lift for handheld use and has a great amount of attachments. My favorite is the hard floor attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Too awkward in & out of turns!
customer_reviews.text: Way too awkward when turning.... requiring more than desirable opposing forces to straighten out directionally. Returned & purchased a Dyson. Hard to control in and out of turns. Wrist was sore in short order! However, in all fairness......”One man’s food is another man’s poison!”
customer_reviews.author: Machguy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, brushroll
customer_reviews.text: Brushroll went bad and tried to order a replacement and they do not sell this brushroll as a single part have to order the whole bottom end. For $119. Was never used hard just from hardwood or carpet. DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: THE Thompson's

customer_reviews.title: Rotator quit after 1 year but Amazon came through!
customer_reviews.text: Our house has hardwood floors so we do not use the carpet rotator a lot, but after a year, the rotator quit working and it does not have a traditional reset button. I reached out to Amazon after speaking to Shark and Amazon is replacing this item - I was not expecting that. Amazon Rocks!!
customer_reviews.author: Cobbweb4

customer_reviews.title: Brush roller quit working within 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good at first but the brush roller has quit working. Hasn't lasted 6 months without being a pain. It doesn't appear to be the belt. If I buy another vacuum it will be from Costco, they at least guarantee what they sell for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a brute at picking up pet hair, dirt, and dander. The LED lights on the vacuum and it's wand are so incredibly helpful. Being able to vacuum hard floors and switch the pile height for carpet is a bonus. The attachments are extensive! The ONLY reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is the fact it is HEAVY. That may be a problem for some people as it can be a tiny bit cumbersome. For me, I'll deal with the weight of the machine to get the extraordinary cleaning power it gives. I truly love this thing. It is my 2nd Shark and this brand never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderski

customer_reviews.title: Love this replacement for Dyson animal
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this Shark for almost a year. Farming family, two dogs in the house, (german Shepard/lab mix and a Corgi) creates a duo of dirt and hair that constitutes everyday vacuuming. This machine meets and greets everyday. I have had no problems. It performs as good if not better than my Dyson Animal. If I had to request one change it would be for a longer electrical cord. In addition I have real hardwood Oak floors and it has not scratched them using the higher brissel setting but I do recommend buying the Shark Dust away Hard Floor Head attachment with Micro fiber pad. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pet parents
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this vacuum. I have wanted a shark for a long time, but they are pricey. For someone with 2 pets that shed a lot, a good vacuum is a must have. So worth the price you pay. Multiple functions on the vacuum and the suction is amazing. The lights on the front and on the detachable handle are so helpful to see ever hair on my dark wood floor. This vacuum has actually made me enjoy vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My first vacuum I've ever bought myself (I feel like such an adult). I did tons of research and this was the front runner. I am so glad I did. We have one dog who leaves hair everywhere and 3 kids. The photo is just from moving our recliner and vacuuming underneath. I'm so impressed by the suction!! Doing the steps was a BREEZE! I took it to my grandparents and did their just bc I was having so much fun lol. I love all the tools and ways you can utilize the different functions. All around #1 best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it was lightweight and could easily be transported upstairs. Nope. The advertised weight is not accurate. It is a good vacuum if used on one floor and if you aren't going to try to transition the vacuum from upright to its other configurations. If, however, you want a versatile, lightweight machine, it's not the machine for you. I have used it for over 2 years as a regular upright (with good suction for pet hair), but there are cheaper options if that's what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction but had to replace the motor
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vacuum for about two months now. It does have great suction. Sometimes too much suction. However, the motor went out on the original purchase. Customer service was good and they sent us a new motor but we had to pay $20 for shipping. So now my cost has increased by nearly 10%. The vacuum does get hair up quite well, but you will have to spend some time unraveling it from the spinning brush every couple of weeks. I don't know if I would purchase this vacuum again; a lot will depend on how well the motor holds up after having replaced it once after only a couple of weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: John and Heidi Strong

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! This vacuum is extremely heavy, hard to maneuver and almost impossible to use. The swivel turns with a mind of its own. If you want to switch from carpet cleaning to hard surface cleaning, plan on a time consuming endeavor. Then you have to carry a VERY HEAVY canister in one hand while vacuuming with the wand in the other. Don't believe that the canister will roll behind you. It WON'T! It will fall over. I really wanted to love this vacuum but after trying to use it for 15 to 20 minutes, I gave up. I do love that Amazon makes returning so simple and refunded my money within a few days. APPRICIATED!
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Shark True Pet vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, I had one and used it every day for 4yrs, I definitely put it thru it’s paces and when it breathed it last breath, I went directly to Amazon to purchase another one... although this one I just purchased in August overheated the 3rd time using it so I bought extra filters so I could use a clean one each time vacuuming.. but as I continued to use it the suction became les and les until it now won’t even turn on... I’m contacting amazon for a replacement, bc I love this vacuum.. I believe it was a lemon...
customer_reviews.author: Busdriverkel

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband kept wanting to keep our ancient vacuum but one day it bit the dust, literally! So I ordered your sweeper and I can't say enough great things about it. But my favorite thing is that my carpet is 30 years old and I've taken really good care of it. This vacuum made my old carpet look much newer! And the stuff I got out of it the first day was soooo embarrassing! I told my son about it and and they ordered one too and love it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to assemble, and I am not good at these things. It did work very well on my floors and carpets. I was surprised how much cat hair it picked up and dust it removed. It was easy to use the only thing I worry about it the way to lower the handle, the place where you press your foot seems delicate. That's why I gave four stars. If it holds up? I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dlr

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Nov 2017. Didn't work out of the box. Called Shark and after troubleshooting, said the head was bad and would send me one but I had to pay for shipping (FOR A VACUUM THAT I HAVE NEVER USED!!) I instead called Amazon who replaced it, n questions asked. It work fine until June 2018 (7 months later) the roller brush stopped spinning and the head is out again. I paid almost $300 for this and it's been a big head ache!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Blevins

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Shark to replace one that had recently died on me. I have three enormous dogs, all with long hair. I'm talking 365 lbs. of dog (Pyrenees X2 and a Newfoundland), so vacuuming is like a full time job. This Shark has great suction. I could feel it really pulling at my rug and getting it deep down clean. The attachment tools are great, too. I've only used it a few times, but so far, it's a great vacuum for a whole lot of dog fur.
customer_reviews.author: KTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Suction!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Dyson guy. I like the design and styling of the Dyson units, and probably always will. That being said, this is a helluva vacuum cleaner! I was amazed at how much suction it had compared to my Dyson. It practically wanted to run away from me. The handle is also easier to deal with, being able to detach at the base with a long wand, or at the top of the handle for a shorter unit. We've got cats, and it picks up cat hair very easily. This is a great unit, and if this thing ever wears out, I'll look for another Shark!
customer_reviews.author: UncleKory

customer_reviews.title: Dog, Toddlers, and a baby
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my australian shepherd's dog hair, which is a daily task to keep up with it, my baby and 15 month old sleep through it's use, and my 15 month old isn't afraid of it like she was with our Dyson. I think it's due to Shark being quieter. It's so easy to clean. The only thing I liked more about my dyson was the button to auto-wrap the cord back up. It picks up everything and switches from rug, to hardwood floors so easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Get this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: If you have pet hair, get this vacuum! I absolutely love the versatility, maneuverability, the LED lights and the motorized brush for pet hair on furniture! I almost got the one with the duel roller until I read that the foam roller got stopped up with pet hair. This model does absolutely everything! It does not come with the caddy or the under the appliance brush, but I don't think I would use them. They can be purchased separately. I love this vacuum so much, I vacuum more often!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay McRae

customer_reviews.title: A million times better than dyson!
customer_reviews.text: Had a dyson pet vacuum that had to be constantly cleaned out as stuff hot stuvk in the millilns of plastic small bends! This machine is 1 million times better than ghe dyson. No clogging way lighter to naneuver and weird as it sounds, kinds pretty!
customer_reviews.author: dfvixen

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum after reading a lot of reviews. I was worried about it tipping over when you use the attachments. I got it and immediately tried the attachment to clean my couch (I did not even turn the vacuum on just simulated what I would if I was actually using the brush to clean) and was very disappointed that the vacuum immediately tipped over. I sent back immediately since all the reviews had said they wish they would of returned this because the tipping over never got better.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: Great, versatile vacuum. We have two short haired dogs that shed fur constantly and go outside in the yard a lot. We also have hardwood, tile floors with thick area rugs. This vac gets up all the hair and dirt. I like the easy to change or wash filters. The leds on the front are helpful. We’ve had a more expensive vacuum cleaner, but for half the price this does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: consumer999

customer_reviews.title: Bad in laws- suck the dirt off their souls with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It will suck your soul out of your body! Seriously the best vacuum ever! My husband is cleaning the ceiling fan as I wrote this and he LIKES it! It’s amazing to watch all the dust bunnies go to the belly of the Shark! It has troubleshooting ease by pushing a button and peeking in the hose or peep at the roller to cut the hair off. In a house with long haired girls and 3 shedder dogs- this Shark is a champ! (They even marked the button to take the dirt out so you don’t pop it open in the middle of the floor 😉) Woop woop 🙌🏻 Shark doo doo doo doo doo
customer_reviews.author: HollyMD

customer_reviews.title: Solid vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction power and is easy to push and pull. 25 foot cord and comes with 3 attachments if you get it through Amazon (mini motorized brush, crevice tool and upholstery tool) It picks up dirt and debris from carpet with ease. Works pretty good on hardwood floors, too. The vacuum seems well made and durable. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DarkStoneCastle

customer_reviews.title: Keep the box until you are sure everything works!
customer_reviews.text: Shark is supposed to be a high quality product, but when mine arrived, i put it together, and foolishly discarded the box before I tested it. On the first use, i discovered that the roller brush, and the powered mini roller brush did not work. Since this was shipped to me at a military post office, overseas, returning the item, and getting a new one is going to take two to four weeks. I've requested a refund and i'll try to find something with the powered upholstery brush local.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product value, outstanding cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second one as a gift for my daughter-in-law. She is a professional dog groomer and was amazed at how quickly and completely this unit swept up shavings, from my long hair cat. I had Dyson’s for years and they lost power after only a year. My Shark has been going strong from day one. It is equal or better than the Dyson Animal, larger bin, easier to take off and put on, easier to empty, and wow that LED light! Be prepared it shows dirt even people with perfect vision will be surprised to see. I highly recommend this product and will never go back to the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Patti M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile to write this... we go through vacuums one a year it seems. We’ve had them all... and after a month or two we hate them. After a year they break! We vacuum a lot at our house. So far I love this vacuum. If you have it on high or low carpet it kind of pulls the vacuum for you. The hose has alight at the end of it... how cool is that?!?! We had just vacuumed with our old pet vacuum when we tried the shark. I have one dog... look how much it got even after we had vacuumed with our old vacuum! So far we highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner is twice the cleaner that Dyson was
customer_reviews.text: Ok, we've had Kirby a long time ago, Oreck for quite a period, we had a super expensive Dyson for 2 days, (what a monumental waste that was!) and now, this Shark. Shark is the best of the lot. First, it does bare floors very well, much better than the Dyson. Second, the carpets the Dyson refused to even allow you to push it across, the Shark handles perfectly. Shark is wonderful! No issues! We don't have stairs, so no idea about that. Shark is easy to empty, it fits in a smaller area, and it is self contained, all the wands and what not are on board. Really glad we sent that Dyson back and got the Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: I'm not impressed with this model.
customer_reviews.text: We have had two of these vacuums fail in the last three years. The last one I purchased lasted almost a year. I will not buy another Shark and I know this is my opinion only but I am really not impressed with the quality of this unit for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner - the best I have owned to date
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It has all of the features I wanted. So easy to switch from carpet to hard floor with a button on the handle. Love that I can take the canister off and reach under low tables, beds, etc. or higher areas. Picks up animal hair from carpet very well. Easy to empty canister. Lights are nice too. Not too loud. Now I can clean my entire house (floors and carpets) using one vacuum so saves time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DianeG

customer_reviews.title: The Shark is too heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: The Shark is way too heavy for me, and since I have such a hard time putting it back from using just the canister to am up right position I have only used it one time. I just wish that when I realized how heavy it is I had just sent it back for a refund. Is there any sites that you know of that sells products that have been used only one time that I could contact for help in getting my Shark sold to someone who is able to handle a heavy machine? I will say that it does have has a great suction on my floors and rugs. Thank You, Jan Dyer
customer_reviews.author: Bandit2011

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Solid vacuum with lots of suction power, more than the old dyson ball we had. This tru-pet model came with several attachments that always come in handy and a base to turn it into a canister vacuum. we purchased 3 years and didn't have any issues until now. I had noticed that suction power was starting to lack. The lower hose/duct on the powerhead had some tears. Shark was reluctant to warranty the part because if that duct is bad, the whole powerhead is bad. After a few calls they honored their warranty and new powerhead is being shipped. No other parts have had problems to date and we use the vacuum all the time. Worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Paul mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: RUN, DO NOT WALK, AWAY FROM THIS VACUUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two months. They are replacing it, but they charge $20 again for shipping, even though their product was faulty. Not only that I had to pay $35 to ship the old one back to them. So I’m out $55 bucks because their vacuum couldn’t sucks, and not in the way it is supposed to. UPDATE: The new replacement vacuum broke within the month, third use, in the same way. RUN DO NOT WALK AWAY FROM THIS VACUUM! Now I have to pay a re-pagaging fee of $60 bucks, not now I’m out $115 and I don’t have a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible suction power
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum replaced a Dyson Animal that I had finally gotten fed up with. The maneuverability of the Shark Rotator is fabulous, I can easily vacuum under furniture, and the lift away makes vacuuming the stairs a breeze. The ONLY drawback, for me, is the power cord. It is too short; I could use another five feet to vacuum my living and dining rooms without switching outlets. It's also quite stiff, not pliable enough for easy wrapping onto the vacuum. I imagine it won't be long before it begins to kink.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N. Turner

customer_reviews.title: very versatile . will not clog -EVER.  Heavy
customer_reviews.text: best vacuum i have ever purchased! will not clog even when your husband refuses to empty the container and its about to break open. tons of attachments, easy to detach individual pieces. VERY HEAVY . you will not be doing what the commercial shows unless you work out everyday. also, no attachment for the cord, so you will always have to unravel the entire thing and not roll over it. heavy duty and very WELL Made ( that why its heavy). will last a long time (or until the container bursts open)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about the Shark years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my mother's Kirby for years. While it was sturdy, durable and versatile it was impossible for me to lift. I put out a message to my family that I was looking for a new vacuum and got three responses. Two were for the Shark and I bought it. It is light weight and easy to clean the stairs, corners, under the table and chairs. The extra cleaning pieces fit on to the unit easily and compactly. My grandchildren love to use it. Ha ha ha ha
customer_reviews.author: mary r.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: We have a big German Shepherd and with him comes big amounts of hair. This vacuum picks up the hair better than any other vacuum we have ever owned. It does not get clogged or lose suction. I love how the container empties without having to stick your hand in the dust and hair. The lift away feature is great for getting under furniture! Love this vacuum!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Order directly from shark
customer_reviews.text: This a great product. Shark, in my opinion, is worth the money. I love the LED light so you can see everything needing cleaning. However it doesn't pick up the fine dust from laminate flooring. The dust attachment is expensive on the shark website. Turns out you can get this same vaccum with the dust attachment as well as other stuff if you order from shark directly and it's the same price as it is on Amazon. I would have returned this but I had already discarded packaging when I discovered I should have ordered directly from shark. :-/
customer_reviews.author: amber hill

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Good Suction with Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I like saving money on bags, which have become terribly expensive for many models. I like that the Shark Rotator Powered Lift-Away has excellent suction, and that the light on the power head, and even on the wand when the power head is not in use, really helps locate the dirt to be picked up. I don't like how my arm tires when using it for very long, that's why I bought the caddy to rest the canister part in. Problem solved! I miss the self-coiling cord of my Miele, but I do like that this cord is 30 ft. long. There are many pluses and not too many minuses.
customer_reviews.author: BeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Where do I begin
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Electrolux, Oreck, and Kirby vacuum cleaners but nthis vacuum runs circles around all of the more expensive vacuums that I have owned. After reading reviews about the horrible Shark lack of customer service or standing behind their products, I did purchase the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER T.

customer_reviews.title: Sharknado
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this Shark Vacuum Cleaner. Easy to use. Glides along. Switch from floor to carpet in 2 seconds. Take the canister off (easy to do) and it goes under beds and other hard to reach places. Easy to empty canister. I've had all kinds of vacuum cleaners including the expensive transmission driven Kirby and this is by far the best vacuum cleaner I have ever had. I gifted one to a family member as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: 2 long hair dogs and it works!!!!  Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wow. Wow. This vac really does what it says. We hv 2 dogs one a heavy shredder. It works awesomely. We can easily clean filters as needed and dump dirt easily. Waited to do review as we wanted to use for a while as we have been disappointed, repeatedly after using past vac purchases. I hv recommended it to others. So many attachments and love that the canister detaches and you can get under furniture. Wow...
customer_reviews.author: Freedomite

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 2 stars because I'm keeping it since I didn't return it in time. It picks up but doesn't do edges well regardless of attachment. Carpets take several passes. Order something else. I got it because my cousin raved about it. Well, if you are used to a sub par vacuum, you might be ok with it. It does clean somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower suction hose tore after only 1 1/2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum less than 2 yrs ago and at that time I was in complete bliss. The Shark was awesome and (as a former Dyson fan) I was stunned and very impressed. Then today came. My Shark wasn’t performing as usual and after some minor inspections I found the suction hose down towards the spinning brush part was torn in 3 areas. I’m so sad and upset and I can’t even fathom why this part of the hose would tear like that as it really doesn’t seem to even move or have any stress on it. So now I guess I go back to Dyson. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in a home where Electrolux was the vacuum of choice. My dad sold them, so it would have sacrilegious to use anything else. When our 27+ year old Electrolux finally bit the dust, a little bit of research pointed me to this vacuum. We have two cats and live on a farm. This vacuum picks up cat hair, dust, hay and every other thing that gets tracked into the house without clogging it up. I love that there is no bag, so there's not the added expense of purchasing those. The attachments are a must have. Pretty much everything to love about this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Shark we have purchased - The first one was bought in 2010 and still working great Bought this one so we did not have to keep hauling up and down the stairs. Attachments are very good - The powered hand held works great on dog hair. We have a Husky which means they shed almost as much as they eat. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bull

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about getting this product because of some of the reviews but I’m glad I did. I had a dyson which I like a lot but this one is good too and has some pluses over my dyson. First it’s easier and does a better job on stairs. Second it’s quieter. Also, The warranty looks good. When you purchase through Amazon you get a 7 year warranty with the manufacturer. I didn’t know that when I bought it so I bought the extra 2 year warranty so now I have a as 9 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: zoey

customer_reviews.title: Diappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, it WAS the best vacumn I ever had and I loved it! After having for only 7 months the roller brush stopped working and customer service says it would be $119 for a replacement part, I thought it had a 5 year warranty, well, that was for the motor. You would think it would have at least a year on the parts. I am so disappointed because it was such a great vacumn now I afraid to replace it with another one of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Minock

customer_reviews.title: Clogs on carpeting
customer_reviews.text: Did really well on area rugs and hard flooring. However, on the first time vacuuming my thicker carpeting upstairs, the roller brush stopped turning and trouble shooting directly with Shark concluded that it had malfunctioned...this vacuum is 2 days old! Rep for Shark says it's not made for thick carpet (although there's a setting for thick carpet on the vacuum...hmm). My carpeting is not abnormally thick. It's pretty typical carpeting. Very disappointed. I did a lot of research on this vacuum before purchase. Apparently not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Burns

customer_reviews.title: BROKE :-(
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 6 months of purchase, Amazon only covers returns within 30 days so I had to call the "SharkNinja Family." Shark would not replace the vacuum they wanted to send me a vacuum motor to fix their defective vacuum :-( Shark need to change their name and remove the word "family" as the customer service representative did not provide good customer service. "Sharks" are predatory so SharkNinja Family need to change their name.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fur be gone
customer_reviews.text: Got this after my former shark would no longer pick up fur on the carpet. Blue carpet and white fur, not a great mix. This vacuum is very powerful. It picked up all the fur. I can't remember my blue carpet looking to Blue. Love that your can remove the canister to get under furniture. I read the reviews and initially when I read people talking about their arm hurting because the vacuum pulls because it's so powerful i initially thought wow, these people are weak (sorry for that judgment). But yes, on hardwood I have this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE/I HATE MY SHARK!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Shark, when it is working. This is my second in 4 years. The first was burnt up because of that loose carpet strand getting sucked up and the vac not getting turned off quick enough. That one, ok, I see where that one could be on me. But this one worked great until...it just wouldn't turn on. That's it, done, thru, life over. Why would a $320. vacuum not work for more than 18 months, in a 1200 SF home with hard wood floors. Sadly, I will now look at other brands, although I will never buy a Dyson. Prices are ridiculous. Shark? Anything?
customer_reviews.author: Angelia crozier

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: This Shark vacuum is amazing! It is my first one of this brand, and it by far outperforms a more expensive upright in versatility and ease of use. Putting it together was incredibly easy...every piece fits in place with a snap sound and the same applies for when you remove the wand for cleaning hard to reach places, or when vacuuming underneath low tables and furniture. It is the best vacuum I've ever owned and I hope it lasts in durability! Truly does a far better job than vacuums costing twice as much!
customer_reviews.author: MT Chic

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum we've owned
customer_reviews.text: Our Dyson ball finally gave out. The motor burned up (smoked actually). Never liked the maneuverability of the Dyson. This one is more powerful, moves and steers easier, and works great. Love the suction, the headlight really shows what's up under the coach or table, moves from carpet to tile at the flick of a button on the handle. Only complaint is the power cord is about 2 feet shorter than the Dyson. Wish it were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jlst

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Shark vacuums for a number of years. Never have I been let down. This one. A total beast! This vacuum sucks up everything in it's way with no difficulty. It's a heavy vacuum so may not be the best for someone who struggles with weighted items. It allows me to reach everywhere and detaches to make stairs so much easier. The only difficulty is that there is no place to store the extra pieces that come with it. I can handle that. Best Shark that I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Works well and picks up a good amount of my pomeranians hair from the carpet
customer_reviews.text: Love my new vacuum. I have a pomeranian and carpet in majority of my house. The first time I used this vacuum I was amazed at how much I picked up. Its pretty light and compact from previous vacuums i have. I haven't had any problem with it so far. The hair does get caught in the roller, but better than some of the other cheaper vacuums I have had. I like how easy it comes apart to get the handle out to reach higher places. I wish the cord was a little longer, but it still does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Great at picking up dust!  HORRIBLE using the hose higher than vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up more dust than any other I have ever owned, including Orecks. My only complaint is that the swivel feature pulls a bit when turning direction. I was hoping for a completely smooth easy vacuuming experience, whereby the turning does require a bit of control. I am updating this as I was using the hose portion with the small brush attachment to vacuum my wood blinds. The hose is SO rigid and hard to use. EVERY TIME you pull the hose up, the vacuum falls over. SO ANNOYING!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieInNaples

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy-attachments not on board
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum. It has good suction, turning is wonderful, and I love the fact I can get underneath things without having to use attachments all the time. You almost have to find your rhythm with this vacuum like when to lift the canister off the upright, when to use the attachments etc. The canister is small so you have to empty often. I love the LED lights on the front of the upright which makes seeing the crud on the floor a little easier. I have only had this for a little while. I'm sure I will have more information to offer once I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Justmecc

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating to see how much dust/fur etc has been lurking in your carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an Oreck. Switching from upright to cannister mode is a synch & all the attachments greatly improved the efficacy of my spring cleaning. The only thing I haven't yet tried is the hardwood floor attachment as I used a liquid wood floor cleaning product on them. The clear plastic dust container is great for seeing how much dirt was in your carpets & rugs. The cannister is fairly easy to carry around but has a tendency to topple; I really wish it had come with (or you could buy separately) the wheeled caddy that some of the other sharks have; this is my main reason for giving it 4 rather than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good Build Quality with Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this vacuum is awesome! Tons of suction which has surprised me when it easily picked up things I didn't think it would. I am no vacuum expert by any means but I have owned a couple in the past and this one is the best, with the most features that I've ever had. Obviously, I can't speak to the longevity as I've only been using it for a couple months but I can say it's been great in that amount of time and feels like a quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Ru B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Do you own a pet? Buy it! We replaced a Dyson and we can't be happier. The quality is amazing. Unfortunately, I don't have pictures to show the cleaning difference between Dyson and this vacuum. We vacuumed our carpets with the Dyson very thoroughly and emptied the container of debris. We immediately vacuumed the carpets with the Shark and emptied significantly more dirt and debris going over them then with the Dyson. Truly remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: $300 and DEAD after 3 years of very light use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and ONLY use it to vacuum around my dog’s crate. My housekeeper brings her own vac for the house. For almost $300, I would expect it to last longer. 2 vacuum repairmen told me it can’t be fixed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jeffrey D Trachtenberg

customer_reviews.title: The Shark Takes Bite Out Of The Dust And Dirt.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum cleaner I have owned. The Shark Rotator TruePet Upright has so many options. It's great for stairs as the canister comes off the beater housing. With this feature you are not lugging the whole machine with you. I also like that the handle also comes off. This is great when using the upholstery tool. Antother great item I like are the headlights. I use The Shark to vacuum my hardwood floors. When the headlights illuminate the floor I am so surprised on how much dirt there is on it. I say this because by looking at with natural lighting it looks very clean. The Shark takes a bite out of dirt. Great Machine
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Caunter

customer_reviews.title: TruePet?????
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up a ton of dirt, pet fur, etc. My complaint? A lot of the pet fur twists around the brush and then must be worked and cut off said brush! How come no one has complained about this? Also, sometimes, due to the amount of pet fur accumulated, it is necessary to hand remove some of the fur from the canister! So, what is actually making this a TruePet vacuum? Yes, it picks up a lot of fur, but I was really hoping to have found a vacuum that would then also release said accumulation without me having to help it out!
customer_reviews.author: thatcrazydoglady

customer_reviews.title: Works good until it doesnt
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the first 5 months and then the roller broke, which is fine as it is covered under warranty...except the part is back ordered and they can't tell me when to expect it. So I now paid $400 for a vacuum I was able to use for 5 months and now I either have to go buy another vacuum or just not sweep my floor for however many months. No more shark products for me, they aren't reliable and the warranty on them is great other than you just can't get replacement parts....not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! You won't believe what this Shark picks up from a "clean" carpet. Works on hard floors, has a light when you detach for tight spaces, easy emptying, powerful. Might be heavy for some people, but does have powered wheels. My first Shark and I'll never buy another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, but some minor concerns
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark, so obviously, I’m a fan. The suction power is great, and this model has improved some issues from the previous model, such as increasing the height of where the power cord enters the vacuum, so you’re not tripping over the cord as much, but there is no cord clip to bring the electrical cord higher. Also, the vacuum ‘swivel’ feature seems just a little unwieldy and the vacuum tips over way too easily when using the wand. These are picky concerns, which I am willing to live with because I like the way the vacuum cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Total beast for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money. This is a massive bang for your buck. It’s kicking my last 5 vacuums ass. When it came in I vacuumed my 2 story with mixed floors 3 times and it was still pulling stuff up. Filled 10 canisters the first day. We vacuumed regularly with our last few but obviously they were doing anything but visual surface level pick up. GROSS This thing is a beast. 3 months later and it’s will still fill a canister once a month. Easy to clean, no fuss, no drama, super versatile, great hardwood floor attachment design. Really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum lasted 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, but it just broke today. I’ve had it for 3 years and one month and this evening I noticed it wasn’t sucking. I found the hose where the brush head leans down from the upright part to be cracked open with a gaping hole. Out of all my vacuums this has been my favorite. I just wish it had lasted longer. I’m going to try out the new shark duo clean with self cleaning brush roll next. Hopefully my daughters long hair won’t get tangled in that one.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love.
customer_reviews.text: So i clean house for some who has this vacuum. I fell in love and was having a torrid affair with her vacuum and decided it was time to buy one for myself. It has the ability to pick up fine dust as well as chunk dirt with ease. It’s versatile in using it on all types of flooring and handy adapters for furniture. I use this almost daily. I love the extra long cord so I don’t have to go searching for plugs room to room. It’s a beautiful piece of machinery. I keep the filters and canister cleaned weekly. Buy this, it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: loren

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Had this recommended to me when looking for a new vacuum. It is very effective on both carpet and wood floors. The detachable canister where you can do stairs easily with the included motorized attachment is very handy. Old vacuum was a Dyson ball that did an okay job. This Shark outperforms, is easier to empty (canister opens at both the top and bottom), and the self propelled feature has just the right pull/feel. Would recommend this highly. Don't know about durability, as we have only had it for a little over three months, but I am so far impressed by the performance and thoughtful design.
customer_reviews.author: Christian E. Holfinger

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks.  Literally.  5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner was very easy to put together. It looks like it’s straight out of the 50’s but I swear it’s the greatest vacuum I’ve ever owned. The self propelling action makes it somewhat fun to use it. I wanted to buy a second one for my other house but scaled back a bit to a slightly lesser model and that one has a tremendous amount of suction but not all the bells and whistles that this one did. Both are great. 4-5 stars across the board but def good enough to receive a 5 star rating overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Alverson

customer_reviews.title: Generally Good with some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good vacuum so far and two annoying things. The hose is short and that combined with the small foot print of the vacuum means that it is constantly falling over. The hose is attached to the back of the unit so that the slightest pull on the hose flips the vacuum over. The only support is the housing for the beater bar that is in the front of the unit. I am forced to pick up the fallen vacuum over and over or remove the canister and carry it around. I can't carry it all around and I want to be able to go back and forth between using the hose and the floor fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: So far, a great vacuum machine, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got the machine 2 days after ordered, it arrived double boxed and undamaged. It's 1/2 the weight and makes 1/2 the noise compared to my old 10 amp Dirt Devil bagged vacuum. The suction power is really amazing, first time using it, it must have picked up atleast a pound of dust, dirt, and carpet fallouts from each room. I was shocked to see how dirty the carpet was with using the old vacuum, the carpet even looks brighter and feel cleaner when I walk on it now. I don't know why I waited so long to buy one, for the amount of dust and dirt that I got rid of from my floors, it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tam V.

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this vacuum. It has MUCH better suction than my old vacuum and is super easy to use. The parts you need to remove are intuitive and snap on and off easily. The vacuum is easy to maneuver, too. I was worried that it might not work well on carpet since my house is mostly carpeted, but I find it works very well on both carpet and hard surfaces. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DrivinExplorer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I think this is actually the best vacuum I've ever owned, it is a tad bit on the heavy side and maneuverability is a little bit less than ideal but it definitely does its job. Very powerful suction and comes with a lot of additional accessories l would definitely recommend it. I waited a year to put this review up because I want to check on his longevity and so far it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Holy *hair*k!
customer_reviews.text: Live at university housing that lends us a vacuum cleaner. Due to quarantine and social distancing this is not true anymore. Spent some weeks doing research on vacuums and well... 300 is a lot for a student. Just cleaned up my apartments and I glad I got it! Have only used it once, but will update review if something goes wrong. Just see for yourself... my hair, my cat's hair, a bunch of dust and filth. And the best of it all it was so easy to pass, the vacuum they lend us is heavy and hard and never got as much out of the carpet. Totally worth!
customer_reviews.author: M. AEW

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I Like that it has a hepa filter however I have been disappointed with the onboard tools. The pet hair tool does not perform well at all. Also the brush tool is too cumbersome. It's too bulky to use on many items. Then the entire sweeper tips over when you try to use either the canister or if you use a tool with the hose attached. The sweeper doesn't get the edge of the wall when sweeping, I have to get the wand and go around the room. I wanted to share this information to spare the disappointment for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Initial Review- follow up to come! Received yesterday, assembled right away, everything was in the correct packaging and was in perfect, sleek condition! I give this 4 stars as of now because this is a HEAVY beast of a vacuum. If you have any question on if you can lift it or carry it for a long period of time (like up vacuuming up the stairs) you should really look at the product weight. We vacuumed our living room right away (excited of course) and got a whole canister full of dirt and hair! It made our pushed down, old carpet have life again! We have 2 cats and it really got deep in there. Would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum cleaner until it stopped working. Now it appears the motor needs to be replaced. It lasted less than a year before it stopped working. Also if you have pets you will have to constantly pull the air out of the brush during cleaning. This was annoying but worth it until it broke like many other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Rory’s Toys

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Thanks good as new electronics for a screaming deal on this. This is the most powerful floor vac I've used. The wand felt like my shop vac, the brush pulled me more than my dog does, it's super quiet, like E.T. spaceship with all the LEDs. The lift away is dope. Sexy cool guy attachments. Only down fall is this maroon color is grandma
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: Not all Sharks are the same. Powerful vacuum, does the job. Only complaint: small canister
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent vacuum. We had bought a different shark vacuum last year, hearing good things about the brand but doing little research. That vacuum was awful -- didn't pick up dirt, constantly getting clogged, etc. After doing better research, we read great things about this shark and were NOT disappointed! We have two kids and a dog. This is powerful and picks-up everything. Good at getting in small spaces. The attachments are powerful as well. My only complaint is that the canister is small and often requires me to empty it several times while vacuuming my house. But given the job it does, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great on pet fur!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! World wonders on our extremely fuzzy carpets. Our old vacuum died and it took us a couple weeks to order a new one, and with four big dogs (Goldens and Chow) I'd been using a dog brush to try to keep it from getting too bad...actually brushing the carpet to get up the fur. So it was horribly messy by the time I got this one. It was amazing. I've never had a vacuum that did such a great job on the first pass, and I don't buy cheap vacuums! Fingers crossed for it to last, but it seems very durable, easy to use and empty, and so far we're loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davies

customer_reviews.title: A Shark that Devours Dog Hair!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum rocks. Suction on the agitator and the hose are super high. This thing pulls up so much dirt and pet hair with ease. Handle mounted controls are genius. Haven't had any issues with clogging. I have a golden retriever who blows his coat pretty bad when the temperature rises. This vacuum has no problem with it. It's well made and heavy. Super bright LED lights on the floor brush and the wand. (Great for seeing cobwebs)
customer_reviews.author: K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: short life span
customer_reviews.text: This was a good vacuum while it lasted. I have only had this vacuum 8 months then all of a sudden the brushroll no longer works. From what I can tell, it is because the hose is not sealing completely. To get replacement parts is 1/2 the cost of the vacuum itself. I use my vacuum a lot and need one that will last. For how much this vacuum costs I would have expected it to be more durable. Not the case. I will now have to purchase a new vacuum and this one is not even a year old.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: After 9 months, it's a no.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 9 months and after just a few months the bottom clogs non stop, constantly filling with pet hair. It's blowing out all fine dust and particles everywhere when we first turn it on. I like the lift away feature but it's bulky for working on steps. We have cleaned it and followed all use and care instructions. My Dyson Animal lasted 10 years. I may have not ordered the right vaccuum for having 3 dogs but in my opinion any vaccuum should do more than what this one does and hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. LaPlant

customer_reviews.title: So glad I switched
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction power. I was impressed with the amount it was able to pick up even after I had already used my old vacuum. The attachments are great just wish there was a way to have them all together. It is a little heavy and it swivels almost too easily. Works great for switching from hard floors to carpet. The heights are right at your fingertips. There are so many different options and attachments. I’m impressed and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob720

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has so much suction you cannot use brush on any kind of throw rug which picks up better. It’s awkward and on carpet it was like it dig into carpet and left rake mark. Self-propelled and that is a problem since it is hard to stop, set up to standing position. I sent back. Very unhappy with shark. They had a great 1st vacuum but so far since, there vacuums are adding too much fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for pet hair.  Can't replace parts.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum will plug with pet hair in places you can not access without taking the whole head apart. I am not talking about turning a few knobs to open it. I am saying a 30 minute job and if you are not careful, you will never get it back to together again. Eventually, this brush rotor melted in places, so that it no longer rotates. Now, here is the kicker, you cannot buy a replacement brush roll for this model. You need to buy a new head for $130.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in StL

product_meta.title: Shark Rotator Powered Lift-Away TruePet Upright Vacuum with HEPA Filter, Crevice Tool, Pet Multi-Tool and Power Brush with a Bordeaux Finish
product_meta.description:
Style Name:(NV752) Includes TruePet Mini-Motorized Brush| Color:BordeauxShark's original full sized 2 in 1 Powered Lift Away upright vacuum with detachable canister for portable cleaning. With the touch of a button, Powered Lift Away technology allows you to lift the canister away and deep clean hard to reach areas while still delivering power to keep the brush roll spinning. Equipped with Advanced Swivel Steering and powerful LED lights on the handheld vacuum and nozzle, this vacuum has a completely sealed system with a HEPA filter to trap dust and allergens. The fingertip controls allow for easy powering on/off and quick transition between hard floor and carpet mode.

BRAND STORY
By Shark
feature_bullets: Powered Lift-Away: extended reach for stairs and more
Shark's original full-sized powered lift-away. The canister detaches to deep-clean hard-to-reach areas while still delivering power to keep the brushroll spinning
Anti-allergen complete seal technology and a HEPA filter trap dust and allergens inside the vacuum
Fingertip controls allow you to easily switch from hard floor to carpet mode
What's included: Pet multi-tool, pet power brush, 12" crevice tool

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,115 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 12" Crevice Tool, Pet Multi-Tool, Pet Power Brush
